summary.para: The DVD_PLAYBACK_LOCATION2 structure indicates DVD playback location.

remarks.para: Either TitleNum and ChapterNum, or TitleNum and TimeCode, are sufficient to save the playback location for simple linear movies.

summary.para: Title number for the whole disc (not the track number of the Video Title Set).
Part-of-title number with title. 0xffffffff if not a simple linear movie.
Timecode. Use for current playback time. 0xffffffff if not a simple linear movie.
